name: The Game For Skippers
description:
A short story about a person that wants to get achievements.
It will take less than an hour to fully read.
The game is minimum price.

This is a visual novel where your choices make an impact. Do the wrong choices, and you will lose.
Follow the story of the main character, as you try to get all achievements.

Features

  • Short
  • 100 Steam achievements
  • Easy controls
  • All art has been hand-drawn
  • Possibility to skip (if story is not interesting)
